name: Project G.R.I.L.L.
description:
G.R.I.L.L. is a experiment that can change forms when it gather enough energy, each form has different habilities and behaviour. Help G.R.I.L.L. escape from the labs, fighting security robots and finding the ID cards.

#LD35 entry. Theme: Shapeshift

Controls

  • WASD -> Movement
  • Mouse -> Aiming
  • Left Click -> Attacking/Selecting
  • Space -> Select Transformation

Credits
